alert.note: Alert for Bulloch; Candler; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 3:56PM EDT until May 06 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BULLOCH...CANDLER AND TATTNALL COUNTIES... At 356 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Metter, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Statesboro, Metter, Brooklet, Portal, Cobbtown, Pulaski, Register, Aline, Georgia Southern and Hopeulikit. This warning includes I-16 between mile markers 96 and 114. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
